fields.description:
1) Create default classic project.
2) Build the app on Android Emulator => App install and launch successfully.
3) Clean the app.
4) Build the app against Android device.

Actual Result - Shows message "[ERROR] :  Failed to compile Java source files". See the log file.

Expected Result - Build should happen successfully.
fields.summary: Studio: Build fail with message 'Failed to compile Java source files' for Android platform
fields.environment:

titanium-code-processor - 1.1.0-beta
OS - Windows 7
Device - Galaxy Nexus 4, Samsung Galaxy Note 2.3.6

comments.body: Resolving as duplicate of linked issue.

Tried with SDK latest build "3.2.0.v20131203104847" and getting the same issue as mentioned in the description and log file.
Environment - 
Appc Studio - 3.2.0.201311272052
SDK - 3.2.0.v20131203104847
acs - 1.0.9
Alloy - 1.3.0-beta

Reopening to set resolution to duplicate and then closing. We will track progress on this issue via the linked TIMOB-15839.
